name: Imperial Press Direct
tagline: IPD is the largest automotive solutions in America
description: IPD is one of the largest, privately-held automotive solutions companies in America, specializing in direct mail, business development, advertising, database management, printing, fulfillment, premiums, incentives and lead generation. For over a decade now, franchised dealerships across the country have counted on they to produce integrated marketing solutions that generate traffic, qualified leads and consistent increases in high-grossing unit sales.
